short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Slam Dunk wallpaper turn new tab to The First Slam Dunk background. Slam Dunk wallpaper theme for anime fans

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Slam Dunk wallpapers with every new tab.
2. Customize your Slam Dunk background: randomize or favorite in the selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to email and social media accounts.
5. Automatic display of the current date and time.
6. New Note feature for task management.
7. Quick navigation to frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel addition for rapid website access.
10. Immediate access to Google apps.
11. Explore More Themes with ease.
12. One-click social media sharing.
13. Instant wallpaper downloads.
14. Streamlined access to gaming.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your Slam Dunk tab.
